God does not require His children to remain where, by the course of wicked men, their influence is made of no effect and their lives endangered. When liberty 
                                                                           152
and life are imperiled it is not merely our privilege, it is our positive duty to go to places where the people are willing to hear the Word of life and where the opportunities for preaching the Word will be more favorable.--Ms 26, 1904.
